mapper.select: SELECT ID,SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.SCHED_NAME,INSTANCE_NAME,SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.IDENTIFICATION_ID,SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.TRIGGER_NAME, SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.TRIGGER_GROUP,SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.JOB_NAME,SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.JOB_GROUP,SCHED_TIME,ACQUIRED_TIME,FIRED_TIME, START_TIME,END_TIME,SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.JOB_DATA,JOB_STATE,TRANS_TYPE,CREATE_DATE,DESCRIPTION,SCHEDULER_SEQ_NO,SCHEDULER_IP, SCHEDULER_RESULT,EXECUTOR_IP,EXECUTOR_RESULT FROM SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN LEFT JOIN QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS ON SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.JOB_NAME = QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME AND SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.SCHED_NAME = QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.SCHED_NAME AND SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.JOB_GROUP = QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP WHERE SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN.SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN
IDENTIFICATION_ID =#{identificationId}, SCHED_TIME = #{schedTime}, ACQUIRED_TIME = #{acquiredTime}, FIRED_TIME = #{firedTime}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, JOB_STATE = #{jobState}, INSTANCE_NAME = #{instanceName}, TRANS_TYPE = #{transType}, SCHEDULER_SEQ_NO = #{schedulerSeqNo}, SCHEDULER_IP = #{schedulerIp}, SCHEDULER_RESULT = #{schedulerResult}, EXECUTOR_HANDLER = #{executorHandler}, EXECUTOR_PARAM = #{executorParam}, EXECUTOR_IP = #{executorIp}, EXECUTOR_RESULT = #{executorResult},
WHERE SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND JOB_NAME = #{jobName} AND JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup} AND TRIGGER_NAME = #{triggerName} AND TRIGGER_GROUP = #{triggerGroup} AND ID = #{id} AND JOB_STATE = #{jobStateOld} AND TRANS_TYPE NOT IN (#{transTypeOld})
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SPDB_EXECUTION_PLAN
SCHED_NAME, INSTANCE_NAME, IDENTIFICATION_ID, TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, SCHED_TIME, ACQUIRED_TIME, FIRED_TIME, START_TIME, END_TIME, JOB_DATA, JOB_STATE, TRANS_TYPE, CREATE_DATE,
#{schedName}, #{instanceName}, #{identificationId}, #{triggerName}, #{triggerGroup}, #{jobName}, #{jobGroup}, #{schedTime}, #{acquiredTime}, #{firedTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{jobData}, #{jobState}, #{transType}, #{createDate},
mapper.select: SELECT triggers.SCHED_NAME,triggers.TRIGGER_NAME,triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP,triggers.JOB_NAME,triggers.JOB_GROUP, triggers.DESCRIPTION,triggers.NEXT_FIRE_TIME,triggers.PREV_FIRE_TIME,triggers.PRIORITY, triggers.TRIGGER_STATE,triggers.TRIGGER_TYPE,triggers.START_TIME,triggers.END_TIME,triggers.CALENDAR_NAME, triggers.MISFIRE_INSTR,triggers.JOB_DATA,cronTriggers.CRON_EXPRESSION,cronTriggers.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS triggers INNER JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS cronTriggers ON triggers.TRIGGER_NAME = cronTriggers.TRIGGER_NAME AND triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = cronTriggers.TRIGGER_GROUP AND triggers.SCHED_NAME = cronTriggers.SCHED_NAME WHERE triggers.SCHED_NAME = #{schedName} AND triggers.TRIGGER_STATE = #{triggerState} AND triggers.TRIGGER_TYPE = #{triggerType}
